de.malkusch.localized.localeResolver

Interface LocaleResolver

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultLocaleResolver, SpringLocaleResolver, ThreadLocalLocaleResolver

    public interface LocaleResolver
    Resolves the locale based on the Session. Register a resolver at LocalizedIntegrator.setLocaleResolver(LocaleResolver) or by Hibernate's property LocalizedIntegrator.LOCALE_RESOLVER.
    Since:
    0.2.8
    Author:
    Markus Malkusch

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Locale resolveLocale(org.hibernate.Session session)
      Resolves the locale for the current Session.

    • Method Detail

      • resolveLocale

        Locale resolveLocale(org.hibernate.Session session)
                     throws UnresolvedLocaleException
        Resolves the locale for the current Session.
        Throws:
        UnresolvedLocaleException
